name: Pingback Backdoor
description: Detects the use of Pingback backdoor that creates ICMP tunnel for C2 as described in the trustwave report
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.parent.executable:*updata.exe AND process.command_line:*config* AND process.command_line:*msdtc* AND process.command_line:*start* AND process.command_line:*auto*)`
